column4: i got it working when i reinstalled it but i dunno if i removed old copy or not and a big problem came
my laptop hangs there and doesnt go ahead
exact on that screen on startup
even it dont read bootable CD
im on my other laptop now
i am so messed up man i have paper on thursay and all my imp data on that laptop now i cant even use anything on that laptop it just hangs there
then its a hardware issue, as grub is not even loaded at that point
use your backups to work on another system (if you have access to one)
why not, isn't the data important/
people will learn the hard way about backups
you can boot to USB and get a desktop that way

no i cant boot at all, i tried inserting bootable cds etc, none worked. it jut hangs at this screen http://pickledpc.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/10/hp_splash1.jpg and its the first screen that comes up when u iht power button
if it doesn't boot at all I suggest you ask in ##hardware
